items.title: Nasdaq Composite, S&P500 edge higher; Dow Jones tumbles over 1% as UnitedHealth falls 18%
items.description: Markets were still on track to end the holiday-shortened week lower. The Dow and S&P 500 have declined more than 1 percent so far, while the Nasdaq is down 2.5 percent.

items.title: FIIs net buy shares worth Rs 4,667 crore; DIIs net sell Rs 2,006 on April 17
items.description: For the year so far, FIIs have been net sellers of shares worth Rs 1.60 lakh crore, while DIIs have net bought Rs 1.99 lakh crore worth of shares.

items.title: India outpaces global peers, only market to post gains since US tariff-induced lows
items.description: In fact, among 16 key markets tracked globally, India is the only large economy where stocks have not only erased their post-April 2 losses but advanced beyond pre-announcement levels.

items.title: Sensex, Nifty log best weekly gains in over two years, financials lead the charge
items.description: Foreign institutional investors have returned to the cash market in recent sessions. Though their futures positioning remains short-heavy—long-short ratio at 28 percent—Jain expects they may begin covering shorts, adding further momentum.

items.title: Taking Stock: Banks take markets higher for 4th day; Nifty at 23,850, Sensex jumps 1,509 pts
items.description: Bharti Airtel, ICICI Bank, Bajaj Finance, Sun Pharma, Eternal were among major gainers on the Nifty, while losers included Wipro, Hero MotoCorp, Tech Mahindra, Coal India and JSW Steel.

items.title: Suzlon Energy stock jumps 2% on bagging 100.8 MW order from Sunsure Energy
items.description: Over the past year, Suzlon Energy’s stock has risen around 34 percent, as against a 8 percent gain in the benchmark Nifty 50.

items.title: KFin Tech shares surge 8% after firm buys 51% in Ascent Fund Services for $34.7 mn
items.description: Of the 16 analysts covering the stock, 9 rate it a ‘Buy’, 4 suggest ‘Hold’, and 3 recommend ‘Sell’.

items.title: Live: Nifty Reclaims 23,800; Nifty Bank Knocks At 52-Week High| Infosys Q4 Awaited| Closing Bell
items.description: Bulls in beast mode this Thursday as Nifty surges over 400 points. Nifty reclaims 23,800; over nearly 2(%). For the week Nifty is up over 4.5(%), Nifty Bank 6.5(%). Nifty Bank hits 54,400 in intra-day trade. Nifty IT recovers over 2.5(%) from day's low. All sectors end in the green. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Sudeep Shah, Head of Technical & Derivative Research, SBI Securities to navigate market movement.

items.title: HDFC AMC Q4 results: Net profit rises 18% YoY to Rs 638 crore
items.description: During January-March period, shares of HDFC AMC declined over 4 percent

items.title: Markets gain for 4th day: Sensex, Nifty rally nearly 2% as bank, oil & gas stocks bolster sentiment
items.description: The mid and smallcap 100 indexes also mirrored positive trends with gains of 0.6 and 0.4 percent, respectively.

items.title: Reduce Wipro; target of Rs 252: Choice Equity Broking
items.description: Choice Equity Broking recommended reduce rating on Wipro with a target price of Rs 252 in its research report dated April 17, 2025.

items.title: Buy 360 ONE WAM; target of Rs 1058: Ventura Securities
items.description: Ventura Securities is bullish on 360 ONE WAM has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1058 in its research report dated April 16, 2025.

items.title: KEI Industries stock climbs 4% after Goldman Sachs upgrades to ‘buy’
items.description: Out of the 19 analysts covering KEI Industries, 15 have a buy rating, while four others have a neutral recommendation. No analysts tracked have a sell call on the firm.

items.title: Accumulate Wipro; target of Rs 272: Asit C Mehta
items.description: Asit C Mehta recommended accumulate rating on Wipro with a target price of Rs 272 in its research report dated April 17 2025.

items.title: Gensol Engineering shares crash 90% from high as fraud concerns, SEBI actions weigh
items.description: The promoters of Gensol Engineering were running a listed public company as if it were a propriety firm, said markets regulator SEBI.

items.title: Angel One shares sink 6% as Q4 show disappoints investors, profit tanks 49% YoY
items.description: Angel One reported a 48.7 percent fall in net profit for the quarter ended March, clocking in at Rs 174.5 crore, as against Rs 339.9 crore last March.

items.title: Sonata Software shares tumble over 12% as firm says international revenue could fall short of forecast in Q4
items.description: As highlighted by the company during its third quarter earnings call, the estimated decline in revenue was about 2.5 to 3.5 percent. However, the recent warnings mention lower than estimated declines.

items.title: Regulatory gaps, poor oversight delay action in Gensol scandal
items.description: The Gensol Engineering fiasco lays bare a glaring lack of coordination among regulators, rating agencies, and financial institutions. Despite early warning signs and complaints, decisive action came only after defaults and document falsification were exposed.
